name: Jour et Nuit
description:
Jour et Nuit (Day and Night) is an AR experience showcasing the findings of a scientific expedition to the arctic, where ancient runes were uncovered within a glacier. Now on display for the first time, these runes hold a foreboding secret within...

Jour et Nuit was created using ARCore by Google and the Sceneform SDK also by Google. 3D models were created in Maya then imported into Android Studio as .obj files to use with Sceneform. Other features are created with native Java for Android.

Watch a video demonstration of Jour et Nuit (Day and Night) on YouTube.

Github Repository
